loginDescription: Andika amakuru yawe kugirango ubashe kwinjira mu gice cy'ubuyobozi.
registerDescription: Fungura konti nshya y'umuyobozi ukoresheje kode y'ibanga.
homePagePurpose: Gucunga neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, gutanga raporo, no koroshya imiyoborere y'ishuri.
homePageFeature1Desc: Imbonerahamwe zihariye ku Bayobozi, Abarimu, n'Abanyamabanga.
homePageFeature2Desc: Kwinjiza amanota byoroshye, imibare yikorana, n'indangamanota zirambuye.
homePageFeature3Desc: Tanga raporo z'imitsindire y'abanyeshuri, amashuri, n'amasomo.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntaburenganzira ufite bwo guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda ko porogaramu igaragaramo.
systemDefaultsDescription: Shyiraho ibyahiswemo rusange bya sisitemu n'amakuru y'ishuri.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa muri sisitemu yose mu kumenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe mu manota na raporo.
themeDescription: Uburyo bw'umwijima bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe agakono k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha rya imeyili ku bikorwa bya sisitemu riteganyijwe mu gihe kizaza kandi ntirihari ubu.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiyongereyeho by'imbere nk'iyoherezwa rya raporo muri PDF/Excel ku bwoko bwose bwa raporo, igenamigambi rirambuye rya raporo, n'igenamiterere ry'uburyo bwo gutumanaho (urugero, kumenyesha kuri SMS/imeyili) biteganyijwe mu myubakire y'ahazaza ya Report-Manager Lite. Amahitamo ariho ubu ya "Ohereza nka CSV" atanga uburyo bw'ibanze bwo gukuramo amakuru.
